entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
